summary: This is a court docket entry from the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit for case 21-58, United States v. Maxwell. It documents procedural filings related to attorney appearances for Ghislaine Maxwell's appeal, including notices of appearance and corrections to defective filings.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant appealing her conviction in the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit.

persons.name: Christian Romeyn Everdell
persons.context: Appears as an attorney for the United States of America (the Appellee) in the appeal proceedings.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: Attorney for Appellant Ghislaine Maxwell, filing notices of appearance and curing defective documents in the appeal.

connections.description: Bobbi C. Sternheim is listed as the attorney for Appellant Ghislaine Maxwell, filing appearances on her behalf.
Everdell is the Assistant U.S. Attorney representing the government (Appellee) in the appeal case against Maxwell.

events.title: Notice of Appearance Filed
events.description: Notices of Appearance as Additional Counsel were filed on behalf of both Appellant Ghislaine Maxwell and Appellee USA.

events.title: Curing of Defective Filing
events.description: A defective Acknowledgment and Notice of Appearance filed on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell was cured and refiled.

keyFacts: This document is part of the appellate case (21-58) for Ghislaine Maxwell's conviction in the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit.
Attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim is formally added as counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell in the appeal process.
Procedural steps, including curing a defective filing, show the ongoing legal activity in Maxwell's appeal as of January 2021.
